Originally developed for treating congenital or acquired penile curvature (Peyronie's disease) and post-surgical rehabilitation, its use has expanded to address concerns about penile length or girth. What is Penis Traction Therapy?

Traction therapy employs a device worn externally on the penis, typically consisting of a base ring, adjustable tension rods, and a headpiece or strap.
